plugin.name: Apache Avro Maven Plugin
plugin.description: Maven plugin for Avro IDL and Specific API Compilers

mojo.description: Display help information on avro-maven-plugin. Call mvn avro:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.

mojo.description: Generate Java classes and interfaces from AvroIDL files (.avdl)

parameter.name: createOptionalGetters
parameter.description: The createOptionalGetters parameter enables generating the getOptional... methods that return an Optional of the requested type. This works ONLY on Java 8+

parameter.name: createSetters
parameter.description: Determines whether or not to create setters for the fields of the record. The default is to create setters.

parameter.name: customConversions
parameter.description: A set of fully qualified class names of custom Conversion implementations to add to the compiler. The classes must be on the classpath at compile time and whenever the Java objects are serialized.

parameter.name: customLogicalTypeFactories
parameter.description: A set of fully qualified class names of custom LogicalTypeFactory implementations to add to the compiler. The classes must be on the classpath at compile time and whenever the Java objects are serialized.

parameter.name: enableDecimalLogicalType
parameter.description: Determines whether or not to use Java classes for decimal types

parameter.name: excludes
parameter.description: A set of Ant-like exclusion patterns used to prevent certain files from being processed. By default, this set is empty such that no files are excluded.

parameter.name: fieldVisibility
parameter.description: The field visibility indicator for the fields of the generated class, as string values of SpecificCompiler.FieldVisibility. The text is case insensitive.

parameter.name: gettersReturnOptional
parameter.description: The gettersReturnOptional parameter enables generating get... methods that return an Optional of the requested type. This will replace the This works ONLY on Java 8+

parameter.name: imports
parameter.description: A list of files or directories that should be compiled first thus making them importable by subsequently compiled schemas. Note that imported files should not reference each other.

parameter.name: includes
parameter.description: A set of Ant-like inclusion patterns used to select files from the source directory for processing. By default, the pattern **/*.avdl is used to select IDL files.

parameter.name: optionalGettersForNullableFieldsOnly
parameter.description: The optionalGettersForNullableFieldsOnly parameter works in conjunction with gettersReturnOptional option. If it is set, Optional getters will be generated only for fields that are nullable. If the field is mandatory, regular getter will be generated. This works ONLY on Java 8+.

parameter.name: sourceDirectory
parameter.description: The source directory of avro files. This directory is added to the classpath at schema compiling time. All files can therefore be referenced as classpath resources following the directory structure under the source directory.

parameter.name: stringType
parameter.description: The Java type to use for Avro strings. May be one of CharSequence, String or Utf8. CharSequence by default.

parameter.name: templateDirectory
parameter.description: The directory (within the java classpath) that contains the velocity templates to use for code generation. The default value points to the templates included with the avro-maven-plugin.

parameter.name: testExcludes
parameter.description: A set of Ant-like exclusion patterns used to prevent certain files from being processed. By default, this set is empty such that no files are excluded.

parameter.name: testIncludes
parameter.description: A set of Ant-like inclusion patterns used to select files from the source directory for processing. By default, the pattern **/*.avdl is used to select IDL files.

parameter.name: velocityToolsClassesNames
parameter.description: The qualified names of classes which the plugin will look up, instantiate (through an empty constructor that must exist) and set up to be injected into Velocity templates by Avro compiler.

mojo.description: Generate Avro files (.avsc and .avpr) from Java classes or interfaces

parameter.name: allowNull
parameter.description: Whether to use ReflectData.AllowNull.

parameter.name: avroOutputDirectory
parameter.description: Directory where to output Avro schemas (.avsc) or protocols (.avpr).

parameter.name: encoding
parameter.description: The output encoding.

parameter.name: javaSourceDirectories
parameter.description: The Java source directories.

parameter.name: reflectDataImplementation
parameter.description: Override the default ReflectData implementation with an extension. Must be a subclass of ReflectData.

mojo.description: Generate Java classes and interfaces from Avro protocol files (.avpr)
